wikipedia_page.main: David Worthington (born 28 March 1945) is an English former professional football player and coach. Worthington, who played as a right back, made nearly 500 appearances in the Football League between 1961 and 1976.

response: * Dave Worthington (born 1945), English footballer with Grimsby Town, brother of Frank

link_mentions.page: List of Grimsby Town F.C. players

response: Born in Cleethorpes, Worthington is the son of former professional footballer Dave Worthington. His uncles Bob and Frank were also professional footballers.
